text:
Dounia stood lost in thought. 

“His offer feels wrong,” she whispered.

Raskolnikov frowned. “I’ll see him again.”

Razumihin jumped in. “I’ll track him! Rodya trusts me.”

“Will you let me help, Avdotya?” 

Dounia smiled, but worry lingered.

Pulcheria Alexandrovna watched them, anxious yet comforted by the money.

Moments later, Razumihin spoke excitedly. 

“Why leave? You need each other here!”

He beamed. “I have a plan! Let’s partner up!”

He paused, eyes bright. “I’ll introduce you to my uncle.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia feels a sense of unease about Svidrigaïlov's intentions, prompting Raskolnikov and Razumihin to vow to protect her.
